SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BBQChicken
Represents a BBQ Chicken pizza, which is a specialty pizza with predefined toppings and crust.
BuildYourOwn
Represents a customizable "Build Your Own" pizza.
BuildYourOwnTest
 
ChicagoPizza
ChicagoPizza class implements the PizzaFactory interface to create various types of Chicago-style pizzas.
ChicagoPizzaController
Controller class for the Chicago-style pizza view.
Crust
The Crust enum represents the different crust styles available for pizzas.
CurrentOrderController
Controller class for managing the current order view.
Deluxe
Represents a Deluxe pizza, which comes with predefined crust and toppings.
MainController
Main controller class for navigating between views.
Meatzza
Represents a Meatzza pizza, known for its meat toppings and predefined crust.
NYPizza
The NYPizza class implements the PizzaFactory interface and is responsible for creating New York-style pizzas.
NYPizzaController
Controller class for the New York-style pizza view.
Order
Represents an order, which contains a unique order number and a list of pizzas.
OrderHistory
Manages the history of all orders placed.
OrdersPlacedController
Controller class for managing the orders placed view.
Pizza
Abstract base class for representing a pizza.
PizzaFactory
Interface for creating pizza objects using the Abstract Factory design pattern.
PizzaMain
Main application class for RU Pizza.
Size
Enum representing the available pizza sizes.
StoreManager
Class managing orders and order history.
Topping
Enum representing all available pizza toppings.
